title: Entrepreneurial Finance
description: This course has been developed to expand the student's understanding and knowledge of the financial aspects of starting, funding, operating, and/or exiting an entrepreneurial venture.  Credit not allowed for both MGT 4072 and MGT 6086.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 3062 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3078 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
